welcome_message_body: Welcome to Peters, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this city has to offer. We hope you have a memorable stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at County Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic flights for airlines such as Southwest, JetBlue, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and Condor.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
